net.fender.pool
Class SimpleObjectPool<T>

java.lang.Object
  net.fender.pool.BaseObjectPool<T>
      net.fender.pool.SimpleObjectPool<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectPool<T>
public class SimpleObjectPool<T>
extends BaseObjectPool<T>

Uses a Semaphore to control access to a ConcurrentLinkedQueue to implement a FIFO pool. The semaphore is needed because ConcurrentLinkedQueue is unbounded. If you need something more complex than this, then Jakarta Commons GenericObjectPool is probably a better fit than extending this class.

Author:
Eric Fenderbosch
